plot: Mariene, 16 years old, refuses to follow her father who's leaving Reunion Island, where she was born. But does she still belong to this place?
title: Adieu à tout cela
plot_es: Mariene, 16 years old, refuses to follow her father who's leaving Reunion Island, where she was born. But does she still belong to this place?
plot_en: Mariene, 16 years old, refuses to follow her father who's leaving Reunion Island, where she was born. But does she still belong to this place?
